thread.title: Tomsula knows bright spots don’t change ugliness of 1-4 record
thread.title_full: Tomsula knows bright spots don’t change ugliness of 1-4 record - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ron Kroichick
title: Tomsula knows bright spots don’t change ugliness of 1-4 record
text:
Photo: Elsa, Getty Images EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ - OCTOBER 11: Head coach Jim Tomsula of the San Francisco 49ers directs his players in the fourth quarter against the New York Giants at MetLife Stadium on October 11, 2015 in East Rutherford, New Jersey.The New York Giants defeated the San Francisco 49ers 30-27. (Photo by Elsa/Getty Images) EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ - OCTOBER 11: Head coach Jim Tomsula of the...
Head coach Jim Tomsula paused for several seconds. He was trying to find the right balance between his encouragement about the way the 49ers played Sunday night (much better) and his discouragement about the result (another loss). (Photo by Elsa/Getty Images) EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ - OCTOBER 11: Head coach Jim Tomsula of the...
Head coach Jim Tomsula paused for several seconds. He was trying to find the right balance between his encouragement about the way the 49ers played Sunday night (much better) and his discouragement about the result (another loss).
